cmb:
MANA COST: 75/75/75/75
COOLDOWN: 10
desc: Shadow Fiend razes the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemy units in an area.
name: nevermore_shadowraze1

attrib:
DAMAGE PER SOUL: 2
MAX SOULS: 15 / 22 / 29 / 36
desc: Shadow Fiend steals the soul from units he kills, gaining bonus damage. If the killed unit is a hero, he gains 12 souls.  On death, he releases half of them from bondage.
notes: Denies, neutral creeps, and buildings also provide bonus damage through Necromastery.
lore: Harvested souls swirl in and out of the Abysm, empowering the Shadow Fiend to increase the size of his collection.
name: nevermore_necromastery

desc: Shadow Fiend's presence reduces the armor of nearby enemies.
notes: Stacks fully with other armor reduction abilities and aura.
lore: Even being near Nevermore eats away at one's soul.
name: nevermore_dark_lord

cmb:
MANA COST: 150/175/200
COOLDOWN: 120/110/100
desc: Captured souls are used to deal massive damage, as well as slowing and reducing the attack damage of nearby enemy units. Requiem of Souls creates one wave of damage for every 2 souls stored by Necromastery.  The closest enemy units are hit the hardest.  Requiem has a 1 second cast time before it is activated.  Requiem of Souls is automatically cast when Shadow Fiend dies, independent of its cooldown.
notes: One line is generated around Nevermore, 1 per 2 souls, for a maximum of 18 lines.
lore: The captured souls of those past slain are released to ravage their former allies.
name: nevermore_requiem
